title: Issue a Partial Refund
description: As a goodwill gesture for a delayed shipment, a support agent is authorized to refund the shipping cost to a customer.

tasks.description: Locate the customer's order and identify the amount paid for shipping.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and sees the shipping charge was $9.95.

tasks.description: Issue a partial refund for the shipping amount only.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully refunds $9.95 to the customer's original payment method.

tasks.description: Add a note to the order detailing the reason for the partial refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds a note: 'Refunded shipping cost as goodwill for delivery delay.'
